nodes.text: LM-7B was an R-series astromech droid that was displayed on a shelf of droid parts within the Droid Depot in Black Spire Outpost on the planet Batuu during the First Order's occupation of the planet in 34 ABY. It was manufactured by Industrial Automaton and had blue, black, and white paneling and a black sensor.
LM-7B appeared as a prop within the themed land Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge, which opened to guests at Disneyland Park and Disney's Hollywood Studios Park in 2019.
